text: Metropolis Records is a Philadelphia, Pennsylvania based record label, distributor, and mail-order store specializing in the electro-industrial, synthpop, futurepop, darkwave, and gothic musical genres. ==Artists signed== Many of the bands on Metropolis are signed to European labels for their European releases while releasing albums in North America through Metropolis. title: Metropolis Records
